name: Project: Tunnel
description:
Take turns running through a Procedurally Generated Tunnel full of increasingly difficult traps. Touch a trap and you'll have to restart. Run out of time and lose a life. Run out of lives and it's game over.

Play alone or with friends in a turn-based hotseat multiplayer, in which players can purchase hacks to make the tunnel generation algorithm more difficult for other players.

Credits:

Jake "ZombyKillr" Klein - Lead Programmer, Concept Design

BenevolentWhale - 3D Modeling

Bailey - Programming, Documentation

Alec - Programming, Trap Design
